item.title: YouTube video editor (not complex) - Upwork
item.description:
I am starting a YouTube channel for my new somatic movement experience called RELEASE [method] website here - releasemethod.co

I want to create a few types of videos

1. interview testiminal videos
2. 10-15 minutes release method videos with exercises
3. videos of me coaching clients and results

need simple editing, lower thirds fade in and fade out etc.

My first video will be a 10- minutes meditation where I record myself sitting and then you will add effects music and attach my VoiceOver of the meditation recording. I   will need help on what is thwebest way to get good sound for recording and put this together.

item.title: Palm Springs, CA Social Media Videography (Airbnb Interior Design) - Upwork
item.description:
I’m the marketing manager for the short-term rental (Airbnb) interior design company, Somerled Designs. We have an upcoming project in Palm Springs, CA. Since this post is going up last-minute, we can offer a range of dates that could work for this video shoot to happen (this Thursday, June 20th - Tuesday June 25th, depending upon availability, but earlier is better).

We are looking for a videographer who can capture social media content (vertical orientation) of the interior design, as well as some drone footage. Regarding deliverables, we're looking for the items outlined in this document:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1O3Hzdprd4vlxZwN31W-viQNKHKrlfkfsJmhiYi1ttzw/edit?usp=sharing
^included in this document are links to our "inspiration" videos as a style benchmark

As you'll see the deliverables should require very little editing. We mostly want the clips outlined in the shot lists (edited w/ any necessary color correction) delivered separately. We won't need you to compile full IG reels/TiktToks with this content—our internal team will handle that part.

The location is a 2,000 sqft home with 4 bedrooms, a living room, dining room, game room, as well as a pool and other outdoor amenities in the backyard. Judging by similar shoots we've done in the past, I'd expect the filming time to take around 2 hours total.

If you are interested in and available for this shoot, I'd appreciate it if you could send over a couple of samples (social media videos preferably) that demonstrate your comfort-level with the style we're aiming for.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 18, 2024 20:52 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Editing, Content Creation
Skills: Videography, Video Editing, Content Creation
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Talented Video Podcast Editor/Manager - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled and experienced Video Podcast Editor/Manager to join our team. As an Editor/Manager, you will be responsible for editing and managing our video podcast content to ensure high-quality production. This includes editing raw footage, adding graphics and transitions, enhancing audio quality, and ensuring the overall visual appeal of our podcasts. Attention to detail and a creative mindset are crucial in this role.

      Skills required:
      - Proficiency in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.)
      - Knowledge of audio editing software (Audacity, Adobe Audition, etc.)
      - Familiarity with graphics design and animation tools
      - Strong understanding of podcast production flow

      Size: Medium
      Duration: 1 to 3 months
      Expertise: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Podcast, Adobe Premiere Pro

item.title: Adobe Premiere Pro YouTube Video Editor/Motion Graphics Project - Upwork
item.description:
The price indicated is per video. I need a total of exceeding/over 1000 videos. We will not talk about the budget, What I have indicated is final. The payments are made when the video is done, and am satisfied with the output.

**Bid only if you can provide a sample video with a given short audio. Approximately 2 minutes.**

I'm looking for a professional Premiere Pro video editor to work on my YouTube channel. The videos are typically short, 4K resolution, and last between 5-10 minutes.

This project needs a fast laptop or desktop for video editing using Adobe Premiere Pro.
I will provide a voice over for each video (Duration atmost 10 minutes), Then you will cut portions of stock videos to match the audio. You will also add images between the video portions when making the videos.
You'll need to add lower thirds to match the provided audio/voiceover.
You need to have 4K elements(Like transitions, Etc.) to create 4K Stunning videos.
Envato Elements access is an added advantage.

So basically this task is about creating short and unique video using provided audio, Creativity is highly encouraged. And it's a long term project which can last for two(2) years.

When bidding on this project you can attach some of the videos you have edited that uses the requirements above.

Key Requirements:
- Expertise in Adobe Premiere Pro: You should have extensive experience with the software to seamlessly edit and produce high-quality videos.
- Graphics and Animations: The videos require full graphics and animations. You should have a keen eye for design and be able to create visually appealing elements.

Ideal Skills:
- Video Editing: An in-depth understanding of video editing techniques and the ability to produce engaging content.
- Animation and Graphics: Experience in adding animations and graphics to videos, enhancing their visual appeal.
- YouTube Video Editing: Understanding of YouTube video standards and best practices is a plus.

Professionalism and reliability are essential. Please share any relevant portfolio or examples of your work in your proposal. Thank you!

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 18, 2024 20:40 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Video Intro & Outro
Country: Kenya
click to apply

item.title: Onsite videographer needed in Raleigh, July 9 + 10 - Upwork
item.description:
We are a corporate audio visual company doing an event for our end client.  The event is July 9th and 10th in Raleigh and we need an onsite videographer with their own equipment to come and record video + audio of the event, including presenters on stage plus B roll of the rest of the event.  A specific schedule and shot list will be provided before arriving onsite.  

All footage will be transferred / uploaded to our hosting site afterwards so no editing is currently required.  

MUST BE ONSITE IN RALEIGH, NC.  The rough timing each day will be 7:30AM - 4:30PM, July 9th and 10th.  

Please send over samples of your work as well as a gear list.  We expect a camera(s), lens kit, a small light kit, and environmental audio recording (we can record the microphones from our mixer).  Let me know if you have any questions!

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 18, 2024 20:36 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Business, Camera, Videography, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Business, Camera, Videography, Video Editing, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: TikTok Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a team of skilled video editors to repurpose content for the TikTok platform. As a video editor, your main responsibility will be to transform existing videos into engaging TikTok clips that are optimized for the platform's unique format and audience. This will involve trimming, cropping, adding effects, and applying transitions to ensure the videos are visually appealing and attention-grabbing. The ideal candidate should have experience working with TikTok and a strong understanding of its trends and preferences. Attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to meet tight deadlines are essential for this role.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Capcut)
- Knowledge of TikTok trends and preferences
- Attention to detail
- Creativity
- Strong time management skills

Hourly Range: $6.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 20:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Videographer - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

Marketing Success seeks a highly skilled and creative Videographer to join our dynamic marketing team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in filming and editing high-quality videos tailored for social media platforms, including Instagram, YouTube, X (formerly Twitter), LinkedIn, and TikTok. As our Videographer, you will play a crucial role in crafting visually compelling content that resonates with our audience and drives engagement across our social channels.

Responsibilities:

- Collaborate with the marketing team to develop video concepts that align with our brand and marketing objectives.
- Film high-quality video content on location or in a studio setting, ensuring excellent lighting, sound, and visual composition.
- Edit video footage to create polished, engaging, and shareable content for various social media platforms.
- Optimize videos for each platform's specifications and audience preferences.
- Incorporate graphics, animations, and other visual elements to enhance video content.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in social media video production.
- Manage and organize video files and assets for efficient workflow and future use.
- Ensure all video content meets brand guidelines and quality standards.
- Work with influencers, clients, and other stakeholders to capture authentic and impactful video stories.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a Videographer with a strong portfolio showcasing your work, particularly for social media platforms.
- Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.
- Knowledge of motion graphics and animation software is a plus.
- Strong understanding of social media video specifications and best practices for Instagram, YouTube, X, LinkedIn, and TikTok.
- Excellent storytelling skills with the ability to create engaging and visually appealing content.
- Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
- Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
- Creative mindset with a passion for staying ahead of industry trends.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with videography and graphic design.
- Familiarity with social media analytics tools to measure video performance.

How to Apply:

If you are a creative Videographer with a passion for storytelling and social media, we want to hear from you! Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you would be a great fit for Marketing Success.

We look forward to seeing your work and discussing how you can contribute to our team!

Marketing Success is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

About Marketing Success:

Marketing Success is a forward-thinking marketing agency dedicated to helping businesses grow and succeed through innovative and effective marketing strategies. Our team is passionate about creating impactful content that drives results and engages audiences. Join us in our mission to elevate brands and make a difference in the digital marketing landscape.




Posted On: June 18, 2024 20:22 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Business, People, Videography, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Camera, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Creative Suite, Cinematography
Skills: Business, People, Videography, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Camera, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Creative Suite, Cinematography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

Marketing Success is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

About Marketing Success:

Marketing Success is a forward-thinking marketing agency dedicated to helping businesses grow and succeed through innovative and effective marketing strategies. Our team is passionate about creating impactful content that drives results and engages audiences. Join us in our mission to elevate brands and make a difference in the digital marketing landscape.

item.title: Video Editor Needed For Documentary-Style YouTube Video to Promote an Open-Source AI Project - Upwork
item.description:
I'm a coding YouTuber with 130k subscribers (youtube.com/willkwan), and I've been working on a new open-source project training AI to play Fortnite. This has been a 3 month project and now it's ready to launch, so I'm making a video to promote it.

I made a rough-edit of a 10 minute video myself, which visualizes and explains how the AI works in a beginner friendly way, but I'd like to work with a editor with traditional filmmaking expertise to help me make the animations and audio really stand out. The goal is to make a viral video for the average viewer with some interest in AI or Fortnite. There's a mix of gameplay footage, animations, and camera footage.

The current edit is like a mix of these 2 videos I made before but the software I built is much bigger in scope and will be a long-term product. Normally I would just finish the edit myself but I care a lot about this video and want to make it as good as possible!
https://youtu.be/-oUVr_B_cQo
https://youtu.be/S6S8qEKMR-M

Gaming and coding knowledge is a plus, but not required. If the video goes well, I could use help editing other videos too.

Hourly Range: $50.00-$125.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 20:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Dialogue Editing, Documentary, Gaming Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Animation
Skills: Audio Editing, Dialogue Editing, Documentary, Gaming Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Animation
Country: United States
